triggers.description: This trigger fires every time you say "Alexa trigger" + the phrase that you have defined. For instance, if you set "party time" as the phrase, you can say "Alexa trigger party time" to have your lights loop colors.

actions.name: Set Operation_Mode and Temperature
actions.description: Pick an AC of the current user, Set operation_mode to OFF,Auto,Cool,Dry,Fan or Heat, and Set temperature between 18C-30C (64F-88F).

BAZELyRF-magic-light-off.description: Turn off magic light with google home
BAZELyRF-magic-light-off.name: Magic light off

triggers.name: Say a simple phrase
triggers.description: This trigger fires when you say “Ok Google” to the Google Assistant followed by a phrase you choose. For example, say “Ok Google, I’m running late” to text a family member that you’re on your way home.

actions.name: Turn lights off
actions.description: This Action will turn your lights off.

TsN9rJ6W-play-a-spoken-notification-when.description: This Applet will play a brief message when tomorrow's forecast calls for rain and includes the expected high and low temperature in Celsius. Note: only works with Oticon Opn hearing aids and the iOS app.
TsN9rJ6W-play-a-spoken-notification-when.name: Play a spoken notification when tomorrow's forecast calls for rain (Celsius)

triggers.name: Tomorrow's forecast calls for
triggers.description: This Trigger monitors changes in tomorrow’s forecasted weather condition.

actions.name: Play the text to speech (iPhone)
actions.description: This Action will play the text to speech in the hearing aid if connected through an iPhone

JniH7B6Y-good-morning-wake-up-with-sonos.name: Good Morning! Wake up with Sonos & Hue

triggers.name: Every day at
triggers.description: This Trigger fires every single day at a specific time set by you.

actions.name: Play Stream
actions.description: This action will stream audio, such as a radio station, from a URL.

actions.name: Turn on lights
actions.description: This Action will turn on your hue lights.

triggers.description: This Trigger fires when motion is detected.

actions.name: Turn on

triggers.name: You exit an area

wLzqNP2i-enjoy-a-freshly-brewed-pot-of-c.name: Enjoy a freshly brewed pot of coffee when you wake up

triggers.name: Every day at

actions.name: Turn on
actions.description: This Action will turn a WeMo Insight Switch on. If the WeMo Insight Switch is already on, it will remain on.

txzkDjcm-change-honeywell-wi-fi-thermost.description: Utilize Google assistant to adjust the temperature settings of Honeywell Wi-Fi connected thermostats.
txzkDjcm-change-honeywell-wi-fi-thermost.name: Change Honeywell Wi-Fi Thermostat Settings by Voice

triggers.name: Say a simple phrase
triggers.description: This trigger fires when you say “Ok Google” to the Google Assistant followed by a phrase you choose. For example, say “Ok Google, I’m running late” to text a family member that you’re on your way home.

actions.name: Set temperature for a period of time
actions.description: This Action will set your Honeywell thermostat to hold a temperature for a specified period of time. The schedule will resume when the time expires.

HXDE3HdR-set-your-lyric-thermostat-at-a-.name: Set your Lyric Thermostat at a certain time

triggers.name: Every day at

actions.name: Set temperature to a permanent hold
actions.description: This Action will set your Honeywell thermostat to permanently hold the specified temperature until you change it.

i9xDcnT2-setup-your-sleep-environment-wi.description: Setup your bedroom for a quality night sleep by dimming your Hue lights, turning down the room temperature with Nest Thermostat, and silence your Android phone.
i9xDcnT2-setup-your-sleep-environment-wi.name: Setup your sleep environment with Eight Night Mode

triggers.name: Day and night mode
triggers.description: This Trigger fires when you tap the 'Night mode' or 'Day mode' buttons in the Eight App.

actions.name: Dim lights
actions.description: This Action will dim or brighten your hue lights to a value between 0-100.

actions.name: Mute ringtone
actions.description: This action will mute your Android device's ringtone. If your device is already muted, it will remain muted.

actions.name: Set temperature
actions.description: This Action will set a Nest Thermostat to the temperature you specify. NOTE: works only when Nest is set to Home.

BM8quVrT-if-its-cold-turn-off-the-fan.name: If its cold turn off the fan

actions.name: Turn off device

aiumq6Hx-remind-me-when-an-office-365-ca.description: When an Office 365 Calendar event is within 15 minutes away, your Nanoleaf Aurora will change to the color you select. Most useful if your Aurora is in the same room where you work =)

triggers.name: Event starting soon
triggers.description: This Trigger fires within approximately 15 minutes of any event starting on your calendar.

actions.name: Change Nanoleaf Light Panels or Canvas color
actions.description: This action will change the color of the Nanoleaf Light Panels or Canvas that you select from the device dropdown on this screen. You can enter either a hex value or a keyword for the color. Need help choosing a color? Bookmark nanoleaf.me/ifttt for easy access to a list and color picker.

triggers.name: Button press
triggers.description: This trigger fires every time you press the button.

actions.name: Turn camera on
